name: Wedesign360
description:
Wedesign360 – advertising agency is based in Vilnius, but we are working with all the world. In 8 year period we made more than 650 projects. Our clients are from different countries, so we learned to think differently as well. We are proud to say that in this period our team won many graphic design and website contests in USA, UK, Lithuania and other countries.
 
Our advertising agency is focused in producing highly creative work that is clear to the audience. We like fresh, simple, clean, visible design.
 
We specialize in: branding, logo design, packaging design, website and e-shop design & development, web application, illustration, typography, print design, photography, banner and etc.
 
Our team works closely with our clients to create design with character. Our advertising agency listens, understands and solves design problems and in the end we create unforgettable design.
Our philosophy rooted into our creativeness. 360 degree logo shows that our advertising agency looks and analyzes our projects from different perspectives. This way of thinking gives us best results.
